runs.comm: short of a length with some width outside off, Rohit lets it go. That was a pretty harmless delivery, if Abbott bowls a similar one again I bet Rohit will go after it
that one hit the seam just short of a length and seamed and bounced away from the right-hander, Rohit swishes and misses
good length just outside off stump, Rohit stays in his crease and plays the ball to point

a loud appeal for lbw, Abbott hit a good length just outside off and this time he nipped the ball back into the right-hander instead of moving it away, Rohit played across the line, aiming to play towards midwicket, and missed. He was hit around the knee roll, that looked close but height may have been an issue
fuller length and wide outside off, Rohit frees his arms and slashes, carving the ball over point, where Behardien leaps in vain
played from the crease into the off side, a yes and no call between the batsmen, it's no in the end
starts with a ball that strays down leg side, first extra off the match
Dhawan stays in his crease and punches a length ball into the covers, did not time that well
good length outside off stump, that's the first ball from Rabada that Rohit has ever faced (probably) and he lets it go
Rabada fires in the yorker on off stump, Rohit is well balanced to play it and digs it out into the off side
good length just outside off, that was quick and bounced sharply too, Rohit lets it go again
a length ball with far too much width outside off stump, Rohit has plenty of time to line it up and drive through the line, hitting the ball through cover for his second boundary
slightly fuller in length around off and middle stump, Rohit presses forward and turns the ball into a gap towards midwicket
a full ball outside off stump, Rohit drives towards extra cover, the fielder from mid-off runs to his right to cut it off
bangs it in short, pace and bounce, the ball rises sharply and beats Dhawan's upper edge as he tries to upper cut
tucks Dhawan up this time with one that is short of a length and at the body, Dhawan nudges into the leg side for a single
short ball again but Rohit is ready and waiting on the front foot, transfers the weight on to the back foot, and pulls the ball over midwicket for his third boundary
good length just outside off stump, Rohit stays back and defends to the off side

that's quite a shot, Rohit backed away outside leg stump to make room and then drove a length ball from around off stump through cover, the timing is good enough to beat the chasing fielder, who dives desperately in vain

a misfield, never run on the misfield they say, but the Indian batsmen do not heed that adage and pay for it. Dhawan pushed a low full toss to mid-off and ran, the single was easy. Marchant de Lange then fumbled the ball and Dhawan and Rohit tried to steal a second. The throw to de Villiers wasn't especially accurate, but it was just enough to beat Dhawan's dive, his bat was on the line as the bails were broken. Dhawan had said no first but Rohit was coming through and so Dhawan went.
good length just outside off, defended from the crease on the off side
opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
that's short and fast, rises sharply on Rohit who plays a half-hearted pull, he is beaten for pace. That was over the top of Rohit's helmet.
pushed into the covers for a single
a speedy full toss outside off stump, Kohli's attempt at a punch through cover takes the inside edge and goes towards short fine leg, there's another small mix-up between the batsmen but no harm done
good length outside off, Kohli opens the face as the ball shapes away from him and steers towards third man. That was 146 kph
good length just outside off, Kohli defends into the off side
banged in short again and once again Rohit dispatches it. He presses forward and pulls, rolling his wrists and lofting the ball behind square for a one bounce four
pulled in front of square this time and Tahir has to slide along the boundary to field
full and straight, Rohit drives firmly towards the bowler and the tall de Lange stoops low to field. That was measured at 149 kph

he got fingertips on that! The ball seemed to stop on Rohit, who had pushed forward, and ended up lobbing in the air towards where a short cover would have been. De Lange moved across in his follow through and lunged, using his huge reach. He only got his fingertips on it though, deflecting towards mid off
he begins with a huge wide outside off stump
Kohli aims to hit down the ground but the ball connects with the bottom of his bat and goes towards deep square leg
defended back to the bowler
Rohit charges and whips off his pads towards deep backward square leg, Duminy runs to his right and dives, and he really should have saved that
punched into the off side for a single
a length ball on the pads, Kohli glances through square for a single
Morris berates himself extremely harshly after conceding the first six of the game. The ball was short and around leg stump, Rohit swiveled and pulled, hoisting it high and far over long leg
driven on the front foot towards wide long off
tossed up into the blockhole around off stump, Rohit gets an inside edge on to his boot
bowled flat and fast around middle and off, pushed gently into the huge gap on the leg side and they race back for the second
the google, Rohit pushes forward to defend and gets an inside edge towards square leg to bring up India's 50
steps out to take the ball on the full to drive towards long on
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

he's cleared the fielder on the long on boundary! Only just though. Kohli moves on to the front foot and lofts Morris through the line, it is de Lange on the boundary and he's pretty tall, but the ball just clears him. Consecutive sixes off Morris.
Morris under a lot of pressure now. He bowls a short of a length ball on the pads and Kohli moves inside the line and glances to the long leg boundary
the short of a length ball rises on Kohli outside off and he adjusts well to the bounce to steer the ball behind point
short of a length but once again the line is on leg stump, Rohit swats the ball behind square for a single
pitches outside off stump and cuts in, Kohli stays in his crease and dabs the ball down to third man
good length, bringing the ball back into Rohit from just outside, he gets a bit off an inside edge and they run a single
Tahir pitches on leg stump and Rohit leans forward and drives him through midwicket
Kohli turns the strike over immediately with a drive to long on
too wide outside off stump, Rohit reaches for it on the front foot and slaps the ball through cover point
this time Rohit comes forward and gets an inside edge on the pad
the googly this time and Rohit dabs it off his pads
really wide outside leg stump, even AB de Villiers can't collect cleanly
chipped towards long off for a single to end the over
full on off and middle, Rohit plays the ball with the angle into him towards square leg
good length, cramping Rohit for room as he comes forward, he manages to push the ball between midwicket and mid-on

superbly placed by Rohit to bring up his fifty! Abbott banged the ball in short and outside off, Rohit let the ball bounce off his bat, using it like a ramp, and placed it so fine that third man had no chance
played into the off side
oh my word! Rohit moves towards the off side, exposing all three stumps to a full ball, and then scoops the ball from outside off stump high over the fielder at short fine leg
played down to third man this time, quite orthodox
flat on off stump, Rohit stays in his crease and chips the ball towards long on
a flat ball darted into the pads, Kohli pushes the ball through midwicket
Rohit slogs across the line, and he hasn't timed that perfectly so he does not beat the fielder running to his right from long on towards deep midwicket
goes back and punches the ball uppishly through cover for one more
fires the ball wide outside off stump
a full ball on leg stump from round the wicket, driven to deep midwicket for a single
steps out of his crease to take the ball on the full and hit it gently towards deep midwicket
he's hit that into the stands beyond deep midwicket. Rohit came forward, moved the front leg out of the way, got down on one knee and slogged the ball high and powerfully
Tahir responds with a googly, Rohit plays it towards square leg
Kohli his time! Moves forward, clears his front leg, and slams the ball high towards deep midwicket, once again he clears de Lange by a whisker to bring up 1000 T20 international runs
over long off this time, Kohli drives the ball flat and hard, sends the ball racing towards Behardien who leaps to try and catch the ball, but it is just high enough to clear him
flat and fast, played towards point for one
driven down the ground for a single
that's in the first tier! Rohit moves his front leg towards leg side, and then lofts the ball with a clean, smooth swing of the arms, incredible timing to clear the long off boundary by miles
played towards third man
nudged into the leg side for a single
this is carnage now, the short ball outside off stump, Rohit moves across, presses forward and then transfers weight on to the back foot as he pulls the ball over the midwicket boundary
another short ball, this one is quick and beats Rohit for pace, Rabada has a word for Rohit who responds in kind
a bouncer to end the over, that was pretty high but I think the umpire has let it go. No last ball single for Rohit this time.
good length round off and middle, Kohli punches towards long on for a single
Morris fires in the yorker, Rohit digs it out

a low full toss on the pads, Rohit flicks the ball hard, the ball races towards fine leg and Duminy seems to lose his footing and ends up over-running it, there's a lot of dew on this outfield, really slick it is
short ball, Rohit pulls off the front foot, smacking the ball to the deep square leg boundary
clipped off the pads through midwicket for one more
a full toss on off and middle, Kohli makes room and drives towards extra cover, the fielder at cover dives to his right to cut it off
a good length ball stops on Kohli a touch, he chips it in the air towards mid-on and to the fielder at long on
full and straight, Rohit can't get under it so just taps the ball towards the leg side
the short ball is far down leg side, Kohli tries to pull but the ball is too far away
full and straight again, Kohli drives from his crease past the bowler for a single

that's a beamer at 142kph, this ball is pretty wet so that might have slipped out. Rohit is good enough to pull it to deep square leg. Under the new rules, there's a free hit for all kinds of no-balls.
Kohli slices a full ball high over cover, Duminy comes running in and doesn't catch it ball. It would not have been out but Duminy is having a poor fielding day
a short ball, that's marginally down leg side but Rohit was standing outside leg as well, tight call
full on the pads and Rohit's placement is superb, he moves to 97 with an elegant flick off the pads to the long leg boundary

Rohit brings up his maiden T20 hundred with a tremendous six! He was into that shot a bit too early by the look of it, but he simply went through with it and punched through the line. The ball cleared long off with ease. It's a small ground and his timing was sweet
Kohli steps out and hits the length ball through the line to long off
a low full toss, Rohit mis-times the shot and the fielder at midwicket moves to his left to cut it off
Duminy's taken it cleanly! Kohli pulled but did not have room to free his arms against the short ball. It flew flat to Duminy and he caught it at head height
a length ball outside off, Rohit aims for the big swing down the ground but Abbott beats him
Rohit moved outside leg stump to make room, but Abbott fired it full and wide outside off. Rohit lunged and chopped the ball over point, Amla chases and just pulls it in

finally Rohit's mis-hit a pull, and a tremendous innings ends. He's been hitting the short ball superbly all night but he top edged this one from Abbott and Morris judges the swirling catch well at long leg
Dhoni tried to let the ball go down leg side but could not get out of the way in time, he gets hit on the thigh
good length around off stump, Dhoni stays back and defends on the off side, Rabada runs across to field
short of a length wide outside off stump but it is just inside the tram line, the bowler is unlucky there. Dhoni had swished and missed
short of a length outside off, Dhoni stays back and drives through cover
Raina moved towards the off side to glance a ball off his hips and missed, that ball was over the top of leg stump

he's hooked it for six off the top edge! Raina moved back into his crease and across his stumps to play a fast, short ball, he was hurried by the pace though but the ball sailed over the boundary off the thick top edge
dropped, Rabada can't react fast enough on his follow through, he stuck his right hand out a bit too late and could not hold on to the ball, Raina had ended up chipping it back to the bowler
that's a poor ball, length outside leg stump, Dhoni goes deep into his crease, swivels and smashes the ball past short fine leg
Dhoni moves right across his stumps to hit the ball behind square and is beaten, not a wide because that was over the top of leg stump
in the blockhole, Dhoni digs it out on the off side and runs
Raina stays back, moves towards the off side, mows the short ball, he's hit it well enough to just clear the square leg boundary. The length was a bit too short from de Lange
Raina moves far outside leg to hit a full ball, de Lange followed him, the ball hits the pads and goes between Raina and the stumps towards the keeper
chipped towards long off, the fielder comes rushing in but can't get there in time to catch it
a length ball on middle and off, Raina stays in his crease and hits the ball hard towards long on
driven to long on for a single
that's dead plumb. Raina moves right across his stumps to flick but misses a full and straight ball. That was going to crash into middle stump. Gone.

a big mix up and Rayudu's been run out. Rayudu played the ball towards square leg and there really wasn't a run there because it had gone pretty quickly to Amla. Dhoni had sprinted from the non-striker's end though, and Rayudu was late to respond. Once Rayudu decided to run, he was never going to make it. He put in a full length dive but Morris whipped off the bails to catch him short
Dhoni hacks at a full ball and gets a thick inside edge that takes the ball to the backward square leg boundary
Dhoni isn't timing them right, stays back in his crease and mis-hits the ball towards long on
a wide full toss outside off stump, Dhoni stays with feet rooted and mis-times the slap through cover
nearly in the blockhole, dug out towards long on
once again Dhoni makes poor contact, tries to pull off the back foot and gets a bottom edge towards short fine leg
a sharp bouncer, beats Patel for pace as he tries to hook
full and straight, driven to long on for a single
finally Dhoni makes clean contact to end the innings in style! The ball was full and outside off, Dhoni wound up and smashed the ball with a mighty heave, blitzing the ball over the straight boundary
